message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. After careful consideration of its value and potential, I'm pleased to offer it to you at $2,200,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth and the benefits it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider my initial offer and providing your perspective. While I understand your valuation, the product's unique features and market potential place its value significantly higher. I'm willing to come down to $1,900,000.  I believe this offer represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think $1,900,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,450,000. I believe this price is more in line with the market value of similar products.
